thread.title: Is Sonakshi Sinha Getting Engaged To Rumoured Boyfriend, Bunty Sajdeh?
thread.title_full: Is Sonakshi Sinha Getting Engaged To Rumoured Boyfriend, Bunty Sajdeh?

title: Is Sonakshi Sinha Getting Engaged To Rumoured Boyfriend, Bunty Sajdeh?
text:
facebook 817 SHARES 
Since a few years, there has been news going around that Sonakshi Sinha and Bunty Sajdeh are dating. The two have never official spoken about their relationship, but have been spotted together at various occasions. New rumour suggests that the two are going strong, and are ready to take their relationship to the next level. Bunty is Sohail Khan's wife, Seema's, brother. Sonakshi is also often seen spending time with Salman Khan's family. Looks like another celebrity union is in order. Photo Credit: BCCL/Twitter
